author: Allison Pecorin, Cho Park, Matthew Mosk, Halley Freger
title: Coronavirus crosses grim milestone of 10,000 deaths in US nursing homes
description: Nursing homes account for at least one-fifth of COVID-19 fatalities nationwide.
content:
The number of nursing home residents who have succumbed to the novel coronavirus in the United States has surpassed 10,000, a new survey of state data compiled by ABC News has found.
This surge in deaths, accounting for about 20% of all coronavirus fatalitie… [+6050 chars]
